short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click on any element and click Delete Element to remove them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you remove unwanted elements, unblocked ads, and/or any element with ease. Just right click on any element you want, and click Delete this element from page. That's all.
